content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 05.03.24 is approximately:

  • personnel - 419020 (+1070) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6657 (+9)
  • combat armored vehicles - 12688 (+28)
  • artillery systems - 10258 (+48)
  • RSWW - 1007 (+3)
  • air defense means - 700 (+3)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-7863 (+18)
  • Winged rockets - 1917 (+1)
  • ships / boats - 25 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 13423 (+49)
  • Special Technique - 1630 (+9)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source: General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 05.03.24.
title: Minus 1070 invaders, destroyed 28 BBM and 48 Artisystems: losses of the Russian army per day
author: Army Inform
